front.title: Face analysis technology evaluation

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The report documents technical performance of prototype age estimation algorithms submittedto the Age Estimation and Verification (AEV) track of the Face Analysis Technology Evaluation(FATE) executed by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
